    • Constructor Detail

      • Person

        public Person​(java.lang.String firstName,
              java.lang.String lastName,
              int age,
              Color favouriteColor,
              java.lang.String[] hobby)
       throws Person.IllegalPersonException
        Create a new Person
        Parameters:
        firstName - : First Name (e.g. John)
        lastName - : Last Name (e.g. Doe)
        age - : Age (e.g. 50)
        favouriteColor - : Color object
        hobby - : String array with a list of hobbies
        Throws:
        Person.IllegalPersonException - : Unable to create Person in database

       throws Person.IllegalPersonException

        Parameters:
        id - : Person's ID
        Throws:
        Person.IllegalPersonException - : Unable to find Person in database

      • clone

        public static Person clone​(Person person)
                    throws Person.IllegalPersonException
        Clone a Person : I hope this is not illegal :) This method will copy all fields from an existing Person and create a new one based on it.
        Parameters:
        person - : Person object to copy from
        Returns:
        Person (with new ID)
        Throws:
        Person.IllegalPersonException - : Unable to clone Person : if it was illegal after all.

      • fromMap

        public static Person fromMap​(java.util.Map<?,​?> map)
                      throws Person.IllegalPersonException
        Creates a Person from a Map Object
        Parameters:
        map - : Data to import
        Returns:
        a Person object
        Throws:
        Person.IllegalPersonException - : Unable to import person from Map

      • cleanInputMap

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> cleanInputMap​(java.util.Map<?,​?> input)
                                                                                throws Person.IllegalPersonException
        It will receive a Map and will return a Map (after cleaning the input). If there is an invalid input, it will return a empty Map
        Parameters:
        input - : Map (from JSON or Data)
        Returns:
        a clean Map
        Throws:
        Person.IllegalPersonException

        Get all records as Person
        Parameters:

        qty - : how many records to get
        Returns:

      • initDB

        public static void initDB()
        It will create the database if the database doesn't exists. NOTE: You may remove the database file to create it again.
